article_title: IHSA Winter Meltdown Cheerleading and Dance
article_text:
George LeClaire | Staff Photographer

Nikki Serra is held up by the Geneva High School dance team as they compete in the IHSA Winter Meltdown Cheerleading and Dance Competition at Sears Centre Arena on Saturday in Hoffman Estates.
